title: Ready to Fall (6R7)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Dunland
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Shadow: Spot 2 sites you control and remove (2) to play a [Dunland] Man from your discard pile.
Lore:	”'Why do you lay these troubles on an already troubled mind?'”
Rarity:	R
